summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs of the Dallas City Council will convene on March 7, 2024, at 11:00 AM in the Council Briefing Room at Dallas City Hall. The meeting aims to discuss key aspects of the City Manager recruitment process, including feedback mechanisms and timelines.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the previous meeting held on February 26, 2024.
2. Discussion of City Council feedback regarding a survey related to City Manager recruitment.
3. Review of a template for an employee survey concerning the same recruitment process.
4. Establishment of a timeline for the Request for Proposals (RFP) for a City Manager recruitment consultant.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include a presentation by Human Resources on the survey feedback and recruitment template, as well as a discussion on the RFP timeline, which is crucial for ensuring a timely and effective recruitment process for the City Manager position.

**Action Items**:  
The committee will seek approval for the minutes from the previous meeting and will discuss and potentially approve the survey template and timeline for the recruitment consultant RFP. Additionally, there may be an executive session to address any legal or personnel matters related to the agenda items. 

The meeting will be accessible to the public both in-person and virtually, with live broadcasting available.
